data.name: well visit
data.long_description: A regular check-up that is typically scheduled every few months up until age 2 and annually thereafter.

data.name: sick visit
data.long_description: A visit to address new symptoms like cough, cold, ear pain, fever, diarrhea, or rash.

data.name: follow up visit
data.long_description: A visit to follow up on a known condition like asthma, ADHD, or eczema.

data.name: immunization visit
data.long_description: A visit with a nurse to get one or more immunizations.
